scoringPlays.text: Calvin Ridley 4 Yd pass from Jalen Hurts (Adam Griffith Kick)
ArDarius Stewart 67 Yd pass from Jalen Hurts (Adam Griffith Kick)
Jalen Hurts 4 Yd Run (Adam Griffith Kick)
ArDarius Stewart 15 Yd pass from Jalen Hurts (Adam Griffith Kick)
ArDarius Stewart 20 Yd pass from Jalen Hurts (Adam Griffith Kick)
Trevon Diggs 5 Yd pass from Cooper Bateman (Andy Pappanastos Kick)

videos.description: Jalen Hurts finds an open Calvin Ridley for a 4-yard touchdown to put Alabama up 9-0 over Mississippi State.
videos.headline: Hurts finds Ridley for Bama's first TD

videos.description: Mississippi State DB Jamoral Graham takes advantage of an Alabama miscue, intercepting a pass thrown by Alabama QB Jalen Hurts.
videos.headline: Hurts' underthrown ball picked off by Mississippi State

videos.description: Jalen Hurts makes a quick shovel pass to ArDarius Stewart, who takes off on a 67-yard touchdown run to extend Alabama's lead over Mississippi State.
videos.headline: Stewart turns on the jets for a 67-yard TD for Alabama

videos.description: Jalen Hurts takes it to the end zone himself for an Alabama touchdown, extending the lead to 24-0 over Mississippi State.
videos.headline: Hurts extends Alabama's lead with 4-yard score

videos.description: Alabama Head Coach Nick Saban disusses first half offensive success
videos.headline: Alabama Head Coach Nick Saban disusses first half offensive success

videos.description: Jalen Hurts run for 1 yd to the MisSt 35 Jalen Hurts fumbled, recovered by MisSt
videos.headline: Mississippi State forces a Jalen Hurts fumble

videos.description: Jalen Hurts pass complete to ArDarius Stewart for 15 yds for a TD
videos.headline: Jalen Hurts pass to ArDarius Stewart for 15 yds for a TD

videos.description: Alabama QB Jalen Hurts connects once again with ArDarius Stewart for a 20-yard touchdown against Mississippi State.
videos.headline: Hurts throws his fourth TD of the game, his third to Stewart

videos.description: Cooper Bateman pass complete to Trevon Diggs for 5 yds for a TD
videos.headline: Cooper Bateman pass to Trevon Diggs for 5 yds for a TD

videos.description: Alabama coach Nick Saban talks about the Crimson Tide's improved passing game in a 51-3 win against Mississippi State.
videos.headline: Saban pleased with Alabama's balance on offense

videos.description: Calvin Ridley and ArDarius Stewart discuss the Crimson Tide's passing attack in their 51-3 victory over the Bulldogs.
videos.headline: Bama wide receivers step up against Mississippi State

videos.description: Breaking down Alabama's 51-3 win over Mississippi State
videos.headline: Breaking down Alabama's 51-3 win over Mississippi State

videos.description: Alabama's Jalen Hurts accounts for five touchdowns as the Crimson Tide rout Mississippi State 51-3.
videos.headline: Hurts leads Alabama's rout of Mississippi State

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Hurts leads Alabama's rout of Mississippi State) 2016/11/12 ESHEET

videos.description: Quarterback Jalen Hurts passes for career highs of 347 yards and four touchdowns and rushes for 100 yards in No. 1 Alabama's 51-3 win against Mississippi State.
videos.headline: Jalen Hurts leads No. 1 Crimson Tide past Bulldogs
